DOC.brief_summary: To determine if Tetrix Cream,, when applied to the skin, acts as a barrier to prevent injury to the skin
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Tetrix Cream as a Protective Barrier Against Injurious Materials
DOC.criteria: Normal subjects who are sensitized to nickel, neomycin, or fragrance mix. Under 18 years of age.
DOC.keyword: The efficacy of Tetrix Cream to prevent an antigen reaction on the skin.
